title: I didnt get Lp?
body: the server didn't crash so this different from the ones ive seen. so this is happening b4 the match history was gone due to some latency I didn't get my lp from the ranked game I went from 62 to 62? plz help (currently lost 2 games after the 62)

replies.body:
Sometimes the client can have little hiccups where the number totals take a bit to update on your end. I went ahead and looked into your LP history, and it looks like you've gone from 62 to 92 over your past 7 games! 

Keep up the good work!
